Test Piece Contest
Il Giuramento [arr. Round]
Town Hall, Motherwell, North Lanarkshire, Scotland, UK Scottish Amateur Band Association contest - open to the West of Scotland (second section). Five prize winners go forward to final in Glasgow on 10th December 1921
14 bands competed.
